name: NerdWallet
description: Personal finance website offering tools and advice for credit cards, loans, and investing

name: Robinhood
description: Commission-free stock, ETF, and crypto trading app for retail investors

name: SoFi
description: All-in-one fintech platform for banking, investing, student loans, and personal finance

name: Chime
description: Fee-free mobile banking with early direct deposit and automatic savings

name: Wealthfront
description: Automated investment management with tax-loss harvesting and financial planning

name: Betterment
description: Robo-advisor offering automated investing, retirement planning, and cash management

name: Credit Karma
description: Free credit scores, reports, and monitoring with personalized financial recommendations

name: Mint
description: Free budgeting app that tracks spending, bills, and credit scores in one place

name: YNAB
description: Zero-based budgeting app that helps users give every dollar a job

name: Wise
description: International money transfer service with low fees and real exchange rates

name: PayPal
description: Global online payments platform for sending, receiving, and merchant transactions

name: Venmo
description: Social payments app for splitting bills and sending money between friends

name: Cash App
description: Mobile payment service with investing, Bitcoin trading, and direct deposit features

name: Ally Bank
description: Online-only bank with high-yield savings accounts and no monthly fees

name: Marcus by Goldman Sachs
description: Consumer banking brand from Goldman Sachs offering savings, CDs, and personal loans

name: Lemonade
description: AI-powered insurance company offering renters, homeowners, pet, and life insurance

name: Root Insurance
description: Usage-based car insurance using smartphone data to personalize rates

name: Acorns
description: Micro-investing app that rounds up purchases and invests the spare change

name: Coinbase
description: Major cryptocurrency exchange for buying, selling, and storing digital assets

name: Stripe
description: Payment processing platform for internet businesses with developer-friendly APIs
